text: @NikkiHaley All examples of how poorly Trump has managed the Coronavirus epidemic. 140,000 Americans dead. The nation in chaos. The economy in tatters. A narcissistic sociopath unable to lead whose only passion is about playing another round of golf. #TrumpGolfsAmericansDie https://t.co/TGgcKWmRMh
